name: RPG Prototype (Hishiro14)
description:
Context

The game is a 3D open scene with NPCs you can talk to, and 3 enemy battles on a 2D interface with a turn by turn system. 

You have 2 characters in your party, Leo the Damage Dealer and Pyra the Support. If one of them die, it's game over, so be careful about both their health points !

This is a small prototype I made in summer 2018 with Unity after one year of programming. I was curious on how RPGs battle system, UI and dialogues could be made, so I tried my best to reproduce it with the knowledge I had back then. 

It has its own share of bugs, but nothing that should get you stuck !

Controls

Mouse : Move the Camera

Mouse Left Click : Click on buttons, exit dialogues

Left/Right/Up/Down Keyboard arrow : Move your Character

Spacebar : Jump, Talk

Sometimes inputs don't work on the first try, especially Talk. Try again with different postions !
